text: Hamono qaʙul mekunand da'vati Islomro ej Pajomʙar onhoe, ki meşunavand, ammo kofiron dar qaʙuli haq dar gurūhi murdagonand, zero hajoti haqiqī dar islom ast. Va murdagonro Alloh az qaʙrhojaşon zinda megardonad. Sipas hama dar rūzi qijomat ʙa nazdi Ū ʙozgardonida meşavand, to ki hisoʙu kitoʙ karda şavand
